#include <stdio.h>
#include <cmath>

int sum(int N)
{
    int res = 0;
    while(N > 0)
    {
        res += N%10;
        N /= 10;
    }
    return res;
}

int main()
{
    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    for(int x = 0; x < T; ++x)
    {
        int elem;
        scanf("%d", &elem);
        int x = pow(2,sum(elem))*elem;
        printf("%d \n", x);
    }
    return 0;
}
